SEARCH
Package camppackage

Class Enquiry

java.lang.Object
camppackage.Message
camppackage.Enquiry
public class Enquiry extends Message
Represents an enquiry related to a specific camp. An attendee makes an enquiry and the Staff-In-Charge or a camp committee can reply to it.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Enquiry

      public Enquiry(String content, String name, String userID)
      To create a new enquiry with the content, name and userID of the attendee. The reply is set to empty, and the answered status is set to false.
      Parameters:
      content - This enquiry's content.
      name - The name of the attendee.
      userID - The userID of the attendee,

    • Enquiry

      public Enquiry(String content, String name, String userID, String reply, boolean answered)
      To create a new enquiry with the content, name and userID of the attendee. Used during database loading, when the reply and answered status is known.
      Parameters:
      content - This enquiry's content.
      name - The name of the attendee.
      userID - The userID of the attendee.
      reply - The reply to the enquiry.
      answered - Whether the enquiry has been answered.

  • Method Details

    • getReply

      public String getReply()
      Gets the reply for the enquiry.
      Returns:
      a String of the reply for the enquiry.

    • isAnswered

      public boolean isAnswered()
      Gets the answered status of the enquiry.
      Returns:
      whether the enquiry has been answered.

    • setReply

      public void setReply(String reply)
      Sets the reply for the enquiry. The reply cannot be empty.
      Parameters:
      reply - The reply for the enquiry.

    • setAnswered

      public void setAnswered(boolean answered)
      Sets the answered status of the enquiry.
      Parameters:
      answered - Whether the enquiry has been answered.
